nodes.text: Dymek, or Dymex, was a starship technologies manufacturing corporation, specializing in weaponry and detonation devices.

Dymek was the company responsible for producing the HM-6 Concussion Missile Launchers that were equipped on the Rebel Alliance's RZ-1 A-wing interceptor and newest HM-8's that Jedi Master Mara Jade Skywalker had on her personal yacht Jade Shadow. They also produced double laser cannons, sufficiently powerful to be illegal for civilian ownership, as Dash Rendar used them on the Outrider.
In The New Jedi Order: Balance Point and in the Fate of the Jedi: Omen novels this company was referred to as Dymex.
